body_html: @lw394 haven't seen any progress but I did not have time yet to investigate more thoroughly though - wanted to have a glance at the unit tests and see if something makes a difference from my script and their tests (might be something wrong that we do... ). If you have access to sources, you can patch just like I proposed to make it work while waiting for a proper fix and a better understanding.
